verses.verse: The LORD <WH3068> reigneth <WH4427>; let the people <WH5971> tremble <WH7264>: he sitteth <WH3427> between the cherubims <WH3742>; let the earth <WH776> be moved <WH5120>. be moved: Heb. stagger
The LORD <WH3068> is great <WH1419> in Zion <WH6726>; and he is high <WH7311> above all the people <WH5971>.
Let them praise <WH3034> thy great <WH1419> and terrible <WH3372> name <WH8034>; for it is holy <WH6918>.

The king's <WH4428> strength <WH5797> also loveth <WH157> judgment <WH4941>; thou dost establish <WH3559> equity <WH4339>, thou executest <WH6213> judgment <WH4941> and righteousness <WH6666> in Jacob <WH3290>.
Exalt <WH7311> ye the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430>, and worship <WH7812> at his footstool <WH7272> <WH1916>; for he is holy <WH6918>. he is: or, it is holy

Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> among his priests <WH3548>, and Samuel <WH8050> among them that call <WH7121> upon his name <WH8034>; they called <WH7121> upon the LORD <WH3068>, and he answered <WH6030> them.
He spake <WH1696> unto them in the cloudy <WH6051> pillar <WH5982>: they kept <WH8104> his testimonies <WH5713>, and the ordinance <WH2706> that he gave <WH5414> them.
Thou answeredst <WH6030> them, O LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430>: thou wast a God <WH410> that forgavest <WH5375> them, though thou tookest vengeance <WH5358> of their inventions <WH5949>.
Exalt <WH7311> the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430>, and worship <WH7812> at his holy <WH6944> hill <WH2022>; for the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> is holy <WH6918>.
